rules.cast: Make an instant attack that cannot miss.

details.flavour: A single, well timed strike can have greater impact than any barrage of blows

rules.cast: Make two instant attacks. Return a Card with Blue Rarity to your hand
Each time you cast a card until the end of the session, return one you've cast with lesser rarity to your hand

details.flavour: Long forgotten armories sprawl out before you, weapons chanting out your name.
